text:
Spotify’s ability to generalise from my ambiance play list is really bad.
To go with the Peacock noises from a few weeks ago today it came up with
“Fast Pulsing Burglar Alarm”
WHY

elements.text:
Spotify’s ability to generalise from my ambiance play list is really bad.
To go with the Peacock noises from a few weeks ago today it came up with
“Fast Pulsing Burglar Alarm”
WHY

text: My cousin keeps peacocks on his homestead because he claims that they have the best alarm calls when bears come around

elements.text: My cousin keeps peacocks on his homestead because he claims that they have the best alarm calls when bears come around

text: Spotify has a homesteader's sensibility, it seems

elements.text: Spotify has a homesteader's sensibility, it seems

text: To be fair, it does seem you have rather unique tastes

elements.text: To be fair, it does seem you have rather unique tastes

text: yeah I bet the spotify recommender system is crying way out of its training space

elements.text: yeah I bet the spotify recommender system is crying way out of its training space

text: Maybe it read your mood from all the ad trackers on the internet and was like "we really need to motivate this guy"

elements.text: Maybe it read your mood from all the ad trackers on the internet and was like "we really need to motivate this guy"

text: truly though - I do want to meet someone who intentionally selects "fast pulsing burglar alarm".

elements.text: truly though - I do want to meet someone who intentionally selects "fast pulsing burglar alarm".

text: in the 90's that would have been half of a techno song
